alert.note: Alert for Garden; Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 05 at 7:49AM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska and southwest Nebraska, including the following counties, in panhandle Nebraska, Garden. In southwest Nebraska, Keith. * WHEN...Until 500 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 649 AM MST, gauge reports indicated an ice jam. Minor flooding is already occurring near the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lewellen, Ash Hollow State Historical Park, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Ruthon and Eagle Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
